noun.definition: The acquisition of knowledge or skills through experience, study, or by being taught.
noun.example: These children experience difficulties in learning.

noun.definition: Knowledge acquired through study, experience, or being taught.
noun.example: He was a man of great learning.

verb.definition: Gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in (something) by study, experience, or being taught.

verb.example: I've learned my lines for the play.

usage_examples: Distance learning is becoming more popular.
We are committed to lifelong learning.
